# UIWindowScene.WindowingControlStyle

**Class**

Describes the placement and style of the system windowing controls for a scene

## Declaration

```swift
class WindowingControlStyle
```

## Type Properties

- **automatic**: Windowing controls will use the default system style
- **minimal**: Windowing controls will occupy as little of the scene’s space as possible
- **unified**: Windowing controls will appear as part of the scene’s content
